property.name: include
property.value: Map:Common Data

properties.property:
[[Rouxls Kaard]] owns this shop. He sells the following:
* [[Rouxls Roux]] * [[Brave Ax]] * [[Dainty Scarf]] * [[Amber Card]]
Rouxls can also talk about himself, explain why he is selling to the [[party]], and about [[King]] and [[Lancer]].

'''First interaction:''' (There's a crack in the wall...) (What could be inside...?) (... it's more wall.)
'''Subsequent interactions:''' (Nothing here except for poor architectural engineering.)

'''First interaction:''' (It's a metal door.) (You rattle the bars...) (It's no use...)
'''Subsequent interactions:''': (It's a metal door.) (It's locked.)
'''After [[Susie]] rejoins the party:''' (There's a conspicuous absence of a metal door here.)
(Elevator to Prison.) (Formerly known as Elevator to Basement, Which Just Happened to Have A Lot Of Cages.)

'''Initial:''' (Elevator to Top Floor.) (Currently stuck at the top floor until someone rides it down.)
'''Upon reaching 5F:''' (Elevator to Top Floor.) (No longer stuck at the top floor.)

property.name: description
property.value: ''(Normal everyday riches, acquired from a legitimate source.)''

property.name: description
property.value: ''(Looks like a family photograph.)''

property.name: description
property.value: ''(Castle Bathroom "Royal Flush") (Currently occupied.)''

properties.property: (Looks like a bed.) (Will you rest here?) (... No, you won't.) (It's not your bed.)
(Looks like a bed.) (Will you rest here?) (... No, you won't.) (It's not your bed.)
(Looks like a bed.) (Will you rest here?) (... No, you won't.) (It's not your bed.)
(Looks like a bed.) (Will you rest here?) (... No, you won't.) (It's not your bed.)

property.name: description
property.value: ''(It's a bed for three people, or one three-headed person.)''

property.name: description
property.value: ''(It's a tree.) (For parties.)''

property.name: description
property.value: ''(It's a boombox.) (It's playing clubs music.)''

properties.property:
'''First interaction:''' (It's a giant baseball.) (For parties.)
'''Subsequent interactions:''' (Actually, seems the giant baseball is a soccer ball that's been painted over.) (It would be easier to draw that way.)
(You found 20 Rupys in the hole!) (Unfortunately, that's not a useful currency here...)

property.name: description
property.value: ''(It's a hole made recreationally.)''

property.name: description
property.value: ''(It's a hole. Presumably dug for fun.)''

property.name: description
property.value: ''(There's salsa buried in the ground here.)''

property.name: description
property.value: ''(It's some kind of digging implement.)''

properties.property:
(It's a music player.) (Listen to the contents?)
'''Listen:''' (...) (It's full of cartoon splat noises.)
'''Do Not:''' (You did not listen.)

property.name: description
property.value: ''(A bicycle is lovingly tucked into bed.)''

properties.property:
'''First interaction:''' (Thar she blows...)
'''Subsequent interactions:''' (It's going off to live a better life now...)

property.name: description
property.value: SAVE Point in Prison B1.

property.name: page
property.value: SAVE Point

property.name: description
property.value: SAVE Point in ??????.

property.name: page
property.value: SAVE Point

property.name: description
property.value: SAVE Point in 1F.

property.name: page
property.value: SAVE Point

property.name: description
property.value: SAVE Point on 5F.

property.name: page
property.value: SAVE Point

property.name: description
property.value: SAVE Point at [[King]]'s throne. Disappears in the epilogue.

property.name: page
property.value: SAVE Point

property.name: description
property.value: [[Susie]] needs help with this puzzle to free [[Kris Dreemurr|Kris]] and [[Ralsei]]. The in-game order is Add Spade, Add Diamond, Swap, Add Spade.

property.name: description
property.value: The second card suits puzzle that [[Susie]] solves on her own. [[Kris Dreemurr|Kris]] can inspect it to listen to [[Ralsei]] and Susie's reactions.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Kris Dreemurr|Kris]] and [[Ralsei]] wake up in this cell and listen to a [[Rudinn]]. Ralsei then asks Kris to find a way to escape. The story can progress by inspecting the metal door and conversing with Ralsei.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Susie]] wonders which way to go, but goes to a dead end. She hears [[Lancer]], and solves the second card suits puzzle on her own.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Susie]] menaces [[Lancer]] after he admits to wanting to have the [[party]] locked in the cells. She refuses to listen to him, and insists that he moves aside. Post battle, Susie tries to make a promise to Lancer that they will not attack [[King]] and try to reason with him.

object.name: Susie asks for Kris and Ralsei's help

property.name: description
property.value: [[Ralsei]] presses the button, and [[Susie]] asks for Ralsei and [[Kris Dreemurr|Kris]]'s help on how to [[ACT]]. Once Ralsei exits, she promises to listen to Kris.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Jevil]] explains that he was locked away, and asks the [[party]] to talk to [[Seam]] to obtain the [[Broken Keys]].

property.name: page
property.value: Broken Keys

property.name: description
property.value: [[Rudinn]] gives [[Kris Dreemurr|Kris]] a [[Choco Diamond]] if no Rudinns were defeated via [[FIGHT]]ing, and if their [[inventory]] is not full. Otherwise, this Rudinn can be apologized to if one was defeated, which can lead to the peaceful ending.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Rouxls Kaard]] introduces himself to the [[party]] and challenges them with a block-pushing puzzle. He curses and floats away once it has been completed, and 3F's staircase can be used.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Hathy]] forgives [[Kris Dreemurr|Kris]] for their sins. Alternatively, If the [[party]] has defeated a Hathy via [[FIGHT]]ing, [[Ralsei]] can apologize to this Hathy. This can lead to the peaceful ending.

property.name: description
property.value: The "Bed Inspector" [[title]] is awarded if [[Kris Dreemurr|Kris]] inspects all four beds. This transfers via [[Completion FILE]].

property.name: description
property.value: [[Rouxls Kaard]] appears again to impede the [[party]] with his second block-pushing puzzle. Once it has been completed, Rouxls claims it was not his best puzzle, though flees when [[Ralsei]] asks if they can see it. The stairs to 5F becomes accessible.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Rouxls Kaard]] summons [[K. Round]] to [[encounter]] the [[party]]. Post battle, Rouxls wishes them luck and flees from them.

property.name: description
property.value: The [[party]] watches [[Lancer]] try to reason with [[King]], and tries to introduce themselves. Instead, King threatens to drop Lancer from the rooftop, though Lancer attacks and returns to the castle. The party then battles versus King.

property.name: description
property.value: A single black pixel resides on the ground in the battle against [[King]].

properties.property:
Post battle, [[King]] surrenders, and claims to not want to wage war anymore. [[Ralsei]] heals him in response, and he instantly attacks the [[party]] after being healed.
The end of this scene varies depending whether or not any enemies were defeated via violence, with pacifism having more scenes.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Susie]] stops [[Kris Dreemurr|Kris]] here if no enemies were defeated via violence. Either option causes Susie to insist they should return to say goodbye to [[Lancer]]. This can also occur by going to the left immediately instead.

properties.property:
[[Ralsei]] removes his hat while he states that he hopes to see [[Kris Dreemurr|Kris]] and [[Susie]] again soon. He offers to bake cakes for them next time.
This occurs if enemies were not defeated via violence, and after Kris and Susie spoke with [[Lancer]].

property.name: description
property.value: As [[Kris Dreemurr|Kris]] and [[Susie]] approach the [[Dark Fountains|Dark Fountain]], she muses that this whole event is important, but they must return to the [[Light World]]. Kris then approaches the Fountain and seals it with the [[SOUL]].

property.name: description
property.value: He asks [[Kris Dreemurr|Kris]] to look around the prison. Once the metal door has been inspected, the story progresses to helping [[Susie]] with the puzzle, then Ralsei asking Kris to close their eyes and think about Susie. Ralsei can also acknowledge Kris's other options.

property.name: description
property.value: Expresses disbelief about being trapped in a cell.

property.name: page
property.value: Pair of Eyes

property.name: description
property.value: The [[Rudinn]] that [[Susie]] "invited" to the trash can so she can get the prison keys and free the [[party]].

property.name: page
property.value: Trash Can Rudinn

property.name: description
property.value: Is surprised that [[Kris Dreemurr|Kris]] talks with them.

property.name: page
property.value: Goulden Sam

property.name: description
property.value: The King of Diamonds explain the three kings' plight and the [[Knight]]'s appearance.

property.name: page
property.value: Former Kings

property.name: description
property.value: Asks if [[Kris Dreemurr|Kris]] is enjoying the show.

property.name: page
property.value: Goulden Sam

property.name: description
property.value: Ashamed for making a word search puzzle without a license.

property.name: description
property.value: States their name.

property.name: page
property.value: Goulden Sam

property.name: description
property.value: Admits to refusing to fight the [[party]], despite [[King]]'s command.

property.name: description
property.value: Laments the difficulty of being the fourth cage.

property.name: page
property.value: Goulden Sam

property.name: description
property.value: Want to be alone instead of with others.

property.name: page
property.value: Circus Animals

property.name: description
property.value: Appears if he was found in the [[Forest]]. He expresses anger towards the prison.

property.name: description
property.value: A Rudinn that is glad to have sold beds in exchange for treasure.

property.name: description
property.value: He jeers the [[party]] for not being able to solve the puzzle.

property.name: page
property.value: Rouxls Kaard

property.name: description
property.value: Appears after [[Rouxls Kaard]] leaves, and praises Rouxls's puzzlemaking.

property.name: description
property.value: A Hathy that is proud to have sold gems in exchange for beds.

property.name: description
property.value: The first party member of [[Clover]]'s party, who is responsible for ''[[April 2012]]'' playing.

property.name: description
property.value: Greets the [[party]] and somewhat invites them to participate.

property.name: description
property.value: Hathy states it is the second party member. Hathy also mentions that a [[Top Cake]] was commissioned for [[Clover]]'s birthday, but it was destroyed in the [[Field]].

property.name: description
property.value: He continues to taunt the [[party]] for not being able to solve the puzzle.

property.name: page
property.value: Rouxls Kaard

property.name: description
property.value: Acknowledges [[Rouxls Kaard]] was here, and apologizes for sighing due to lack of sleep.

property.name: description
property.value: C. Round appears after returning to this room, and has become peaceful.

property.name: page
property.value: C. Round

property.name: description
property.value: Ralsei is surprised that [[Kris Dreemurr|Kris]] and [[Susie]] returned. He informs that the others wish to say goodbye as well, and asks to let him know when they are leaving.

property.name: description
property.value: Praises the [[party]] and encourages them to do their best. He appears with a clean shave and top hat if [[Kris Dreemurr|Kris]] donated a [[Dark Dollar]] in the [[Field]].

property.name: page
property.value: Jigsaw Joe

property.name: description
property.value: Claims the [[party]] is the best.

property.name: page
property.value: Blue Block

property.name: description
property.value: States that they owe the [[party]].

property.name: page
property.value: Blue Block

property.name: description
property.value: Praises the [[party]].

property.name: page
property.value: Blue Block

property.name: description
property.value: Praises the [[party]]'s efforts.

property.name: page
property.value: Blue Block

property.name: description
property.value: Expresses thank you to the [[party]].

property.name: page
property.value: Little Ball

property.name: description
property.value: Expresses gratitude, and mentions inviting [[Seam]] as well, though they were not interested.

property.name: page
property.value: Royal Coat Rack

property.name: description
property.value: Is thankful for the [[party]]'s efforts.

property.name: page
property.value: Mr. Elegance

property.name: description
property.value: Is glad [[King]] has been defeated, and wants to take some credit for this unless King returns.

property.name: page
property.value: Mr. Society

property.name: description
property.value: Rouxls praises the [[party]] for defeating [[King]], and also considers himself apart of their tale. [[Susie]] points out that he tried to kill them, though Rouxls offers a plate of worms in exchange for not letting others know.

property.name: page
property.value: Rouxls Kaard

property.name: description
property.value: Admits to being the [[party]]'s enemies, but was cheering for them the entire time due to disliking the job.

property.name: description
property.value: Mostly speaks positively of [[Card Kingdom]]'s future, and expresses gratitude. Also invites the [[party]] to one of her future birthdays.

property.name: description
property.value: Looks proudly at [[Kris Dreemurr|Kris]] and gives a kiss.

property.name: description
property.value: Is confused about what happened due to sleeping through everything.

property.name: description
property.value: States that the show is over, and that everyone should go home.

property.name: page
property.value: Goulden Sam

property.name: description
property.value: The King of Diamonds asks if they will return to power. However, upon seeing his treasure, he is content.

property.name: page
property.value: Former Kings

property.name: description
property.value: Notices there are fewer people in cages.

property.name: page
property.value: Goulden Sam

property.name: description
property.value: The animals state they are fine with the [[Former Kings]] in cages, but claim they must wear animal ears and noses.

property.name: page
property.value: Circus Animals

properties.property:
Top Chef's dialogue varies depending if the [[Broken Cake]] was repaired and returned to him.
* If it was not returned, Top Chef claims the event should be celebrated by him making a metal cake so animals cannot eat it. * If it was repaired, he assumes [[Susie]] is [[Clover]]'s mother, and that she consumed the cake to protect Clover.

property.name: page
property.value: Top Chef

property.name: description
property.value: Rudinn admits that everyone was unsure about who should be the new king, but believes [[Lancer]] will be a good king. Rudinn also mentions Lancer's salsa production mandate.

property.name: description
property.value: C. Round shrunk down out of respect for the [[party]]. C. Round also blocks the path, thus the other floors are inaccessible.

property.name: page
property.value: C. Round

property.name: description
property.value: He is glad to see [[Susie]] and [[Kris Dreemurr|Kris]]. Lancer talks with Susie about the kingdom's future and [[King]] being in prison.

property.name: description
property.value: The moss only can be consumed when [[Kris Dreemurr|Kris]] and [[Ralsei]] are locked in this cell. Choosing to do so fully heals Kris's [[HP]]. This choice transfers via [[Completion FILE]].

property.name: description
property.value: [[Kris Dreemurr|Kris]] can inspect it at any time to collect this [[armor]].

property.name: page
property.value: Iron Shackle

property.name: description
property.value: This treasure chest appears if [[Jevil]] was defeated and [[Kris Dreemurr|Kris]]'s [[inventory]] is full. It contains either the [[Jevilstail]] or [[Devilsknife]], depending if Jevil was defeated via [[ACT]]ing or [[FIGHT]]ing.

property.name: description
property.value: A treasure chest that contains a Clubs Sandwich.

property.name: page
property.value: Clubs Sandwich

property.name: description
property.value: A treasure chest containing a Revive Mint can be found here once all three of the [[Lancer]] portraits have been inspected.

property.name: page
property.value: Revive Mint

property.name: description
property.value: Dark Ponman causes the [[SOUL]] to be visible, and does 16 damage to each [[Party|party member]] if the SOUL gets hit.

property.name: page
property.value: Dark Ponman

property.name: description
property.value: Dark Ponman causes the [[SOUL]] to be visible, and does 16 damage to each [[Party|party member]] if the SOUL gets hit.

property.name: page
property.value: Dark Ponman

property.name: description
property.value: Dark Ponman causes the [[SOUL]] to be visible, and does 16 damage to each [[Party|party member]] if the SOUL gets hit.

property.name: page
property.value: Dark Ponman

property.name: description
property.value: Dark Ponman causes the [[SOUL]] to be visible, and does 16 damage to each [[Party|party member]] if the SOUL gets hit.

property.name: page
property.value: Dark Ponman

property.name: description
property.value: Scissor Dancer causes the [[SOUL]] to be visible, and deals 15 damage to each [[Party|party member]] if the SOUL gets hit. They travel clockwise.

property.name: page
property.value: Scissor Dancer

property.name: description
property.value: Scissor Dancer causes the [[SOUL]] to be visible, and deals 15 damage to each [[Party|party member]] if the SOUL gets hit. They travel clockwise.

property.name: page
property.value: Scissor Dancer

property.name: description
property.value: Scissor Dancer causes the [[SOUL]] to be visible, and deals 15 damage to each [[Party|party member]] if the SOUL gets hit. They travel clockwise.

property.name: page
property.value: Scissor Dancer

property.name: description
property.value: Scissor Dancer causes the [[SOUL]] to be visible, and deals 15 damage to each [[Party|party member]] if the SOUL gets hit. They travel clockwise.

property.name: page
property.value: Scissor Dancer

property.name: description
property.value: A cinematic [[encounter]] versus Lancer. [[Susie]] attacks Lancer to force him to move aside.

property.name: description
property.value: A battle versus Jevil. Drops a [[Shadow Crystal]] and either [[Jevilstail]] or [[Devilsknife]]. See [[Jevil#In Battle|In Battle]] for attacks and strategy.

property.name: description
property.value: An [[encounter]] versus two Rudinn Rangers. Post battle, it does not approach the [[party]] to begin an encounter.

property.name: page
property.value: Rudinn Ranger

property.name: description
property.value: An [[encounter]] versus three Head Hathys. Post battle, both Head Hathys do not approach to start an encounter.

property.name: page
property.value: Head Hathy

property.name: description
property.value: A miniboss [[encounter]] versus K. Round.

property.name: page
property.value: K. Round#In Battle

property.name: description
property.value: The boss battle versus King at the rooftop.

property.name: page
property.value: King#In Battle

property.name: description
property.value: This path leads to the front of the castle, where the [[party]] can return to the Forest. The nearby [[Warp Door]] now functions.
